website_summaries.verdict: A more reliable hose than others with a similar feature set, though it comes with a higher price tag.
pros: Despite its wire braiding, this is a highly flexible and durable hose that stays soft even in cold temperatures
Customers experience very few issues with this 50', 3/8" hose
cons: The fittings can be difficult to remove from the pressure washer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight, quality hose
customer_reviews.text: This is my first powerwasher hose for my new (used) high-pressure power washer. The unit I bought did not come with one, so after some quick research I decided on this one. Here's a couple of things that surprised me: 1) the hose material is flat/matte material, not glossy. This doesn't matter, but it just seemed unique/unexpected 2) the hose is super light weight. I mean that in a good way as having do drag/roll a heavy hose would be awful 3) the hose is easy to handle/wind/wrap. I'm a bit of a freak, and I like to "over/under" wrap things...works great All in all, amazon reviews didn't steer me wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement hose
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually need a hose, but my old black one left so many black scuffs on my boat I had to do something. This one fit my application perfectly and appears very durable, and it doesn't leave scuff marks. It's heavy and like any hose stiffens when charged, but flexibility always involves a trade-off with reliability. Do you want a light pliable hose that may not last or heavier hose that has a long service life? At these prices, I want one to last. I awarded 5 stars on durability from the look, feel, and quality of construction, but the only real test is "will it last"? If it doesn't, I will update my rating
customer_reviews.author: Louis P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good hose
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good hose that is priced well. Hose feels more like rubber than the plastic urethane stuff. It is very flexible and rolls up better than the simpson hoses that lowes offers. The hose seems to be good quality and I expect it to last. As far as I can tell the quick connects on the ends are not meant to be taking off. I'm sure with a lot of effort they can be removed but it want be easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Paramore

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, OK, its a hose ...
customer_reviews.text: ... but a very well-built one. This was a big upgrade from the stock hose on my Honda-powered Homelite pressure washer. Night and day difference. The original hose was barely suitable for a lunchbox-size electric pressure washer. I use this thing pretty hard. Recently pressure washed a coral reef from the bottom of our boat that was well overdue for new bottom paint. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Missing Fatboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the professionals
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of life out of this hose. I used this hose everyday for at least 6 hours a day for my pressure washing business. This hose was very durable and lightweight along with the price it is a no brainer for the pressure washing professional or even the weekend guys. I definitely would recommend this high pressure hose
customer_reviews.author: T Mc

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a ryobi 2300psi pressure washer. Works great with quick disconnects. Just take when rolling it up other wise you’ll be spending sometime unraveling it
customer_reviews.author: Myke

customer_reviews.title: Qaulity Hose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hose as a replacement for my dewalt 3400 psi machine. Its a tough hose, as kink free as any hose can be. I would recommend this to anyone. Hose does come with "Quick Connect" fittings, so make sure you have the right connections, or buy the correct adapters..
customer_reviews.author: johnny kirkland

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP HOSE!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for our power washing machines. One of the hoses has caught a leak somewhere and is about to explode! Wouldn't trust the quality of these. Hopeful that there is some kind of warranty...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is great. Comes with quick connect fittings. The 3/8" ID is a fantastic improvement over the consumer 1/4" on any pressure washer. The larger diameter decreases head loss and ultimately allows more flow through the hose due to higher internal pressure at the spray gun end during operation. Very pleased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Skp

customer_reviews.title: Dubious Durability
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about six hours working on sidewalks. The gray coating started to delaminate, so there were several spots where the metal was showing through on the hose. The hose that came with my pressure washer is about 7 years old. It has been used for hundreds of hours. It looks better than the new one.
customer_reviews.author: JackPDX

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty hose
customer_reviews.text: Loved this house. Very heavy duty and doable. Wish it was a little more flexible but it's ok. I use it to wash my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This hose has performed well and appreciate the non marring cover.Perfect for white surfaces like a roof or light colored walls and fences. When this one eventually wears out I would buy another. Thanks , AFB
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have done a couple hundred pressure washing jobs and this hose has stood the test of time. If you go to Home Depot or Lowe’s and try to buy something of equal value it will cost you about double and it is of less quality. I highly recommend this hose
customer_reviews.author: AtheyMts

customer_reviews.title: no fittings included
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows fittings as does the description but I received only the hose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Adapters are not removable
customer_reviews.text: Service was good, and the hose itself is very good. The one problem (thus, only 4 stars) is that the adapter at each end is NOT removable. Thus, depending on your pressure washer or hose(s), you may have to purchase other adapters to get the hose to connect properly. A minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Have only had for short time so do not know its durability. But appears well built and should serve my purposes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from inside grip
customer_reviews.text: feels like overall good hose quality, but leaks from inside the grip. The leak is constant enough that I wont be using it..
customer_reviews.author: Justin Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality,  a little stiff!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well made product. It’s a little on the stiff side as you have to unroll it out completely to use it. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: K. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Less kinking
customer_reviews.text: replaced a 3 year old clear braided line that burst. this line has much less ability to kink up. have only used it twice so don't know about the longevity yet but definite upgrade so far
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: replaced the hose that came with our power washer with this one . . . original was piece of junk, very light, fragile for sure - it broke and needed to be replaced . . . this one is super strong . . . great durability (at a small expense of stiffness and maneuverability) . . . would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Shopman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this hose for my mobile detailing business. I've had it for a few months and do about 5-6 vehicles a week. Holding up well. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and durable.. Have used it so far for 3 jobs and very pleased. Looks like it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kordun Properties

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use my pressure washer only occasionally but I am well satisfied with this product. It is durable.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Better than the stock hoses
customer_reviews.text: This hose is a lot easier to wind and unwind...and stretch out. It's easier to use than the plastic hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Talker

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot for me to leave a review. This is my second one. The first one is still kicking is just getting old and for the money I’ll stick a second one under the seat of the work truck just in case. I’ve tried them all this one holds up. No other choice. Good product that won’t let you down and that’s all we want people
customer_reviews.author: Robert Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Great hose.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the for a few month now. Works great. A little heavy when trying to pull around the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Did,not last long
customer_reviews.text: I use these products professionally so they get a lot of use.But 3 months of use and it burst on me yesterday is not my idea of good value
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This hose is a little on the heavy side but I take it as a positive as it might make it more durable over time it is kinda stiff but will not tangle like other hoses over
customer_reviews.author: Louie_Armani_

customer_reviews.title: stiff but awesome
customer_reviews.text: this hose is perfect! it's also the same hose the "mi t-m" at most retailers for 100$ ... I 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hose
customer_reviews.text: Really strong and well built hose. Came as expected. Quick connect fittings are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not complete!
customer_reviews.text: It says in add with couplers, it came with NO couplers. False advertising!!
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Again great price. Seems to be of great quality. I arrived very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product; no leaks, works great, love the color. Definitely better than the local stuff I've been buying at the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: David Soltero

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! A+
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Good quality and I bought it to use on a hose reel and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well does not lose pressure for the 50 foot length
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made job easier
customer_reviews.text: Added length makes job easier rather than making it necessary to move the pressure washer as job progresses
customer_reviews.author: A. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and strong
customer_reviews.text: I found the same hose at Northern tool but was more expensive. It's not as stiff as other hoses I've owned and the quality seems quite high. Should last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great hose. Was shipped very promptly. Couldn’t ask for much more :-)
customer_reviews.author: elijah pedone

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy junk!
customer_reviews.text: Used three times and already developed hole near coupling. The hose is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick connect hose makes it easy to use my pressure washer. Not stiff like my old hose. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This hose is plenty flexible to wrap it around real. Well worth money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. And doesn’t mark the concrete like my other ones do. Definitely will but again and eventually replace my others as long as they last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: I use this product a lot and it seems to be very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Washer Hose
customer_reviews.text: Good length, and perfect for my Ryobi pressure washer and Forney spray gun.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 25' hose. Was concerned about it being to long to roll up properly....not at all. Sturdy, flexible hose. Will likely buy another so I can reach entirely around my house without dragging the pressure washer along.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Hose
customer_reviews.text: Well made, the gray hose doesn't marks on the concrete. Good so far.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice hose, quick disconnect is heavy duty and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Toms

customer_reviews.title: Much more flexible
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the stock hose, this one can actually be wrapped on the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Non Mar leaker
customer_reviews.text: Hose does not mar which is a great thing. It leaked from the start out of the male end crimp.
customer_reviews.author: wendy wineland

customer_reviews.title: Leaked like crazy from the connection that attaches to the gun. Otherwise, a nice hose.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first host because of the leak. The hose is light and flexible which makes it easy to coil after use. I will test the replacement hose this weekend and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Softer flex
customer_reviews.text: Softer flex than other pressure cleaning hoses I’ve bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: We work detailing big semis in a rocky terrain and this hose is the best of the best. Love the length, strength and durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great flexibility even in cold
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose. Durable and flexible. Even in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Construction and size.
customer_reviews.text: To replace my previous hose that was only 25 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my husband and he loved the length. We brought one more for our Pressure Wash business.
customer_reviews.author: Lmartinwv

customer_reviews.title: reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Am using it for a spare, so not in use yet
customer_reviews.author: nd57

customer_reviews.title: Hoses look fine
customer_reviews.text: Hoses look good can’t try out until snow stops. Received the shipment a week after notice of delivery UPS fault.
customer_reviews.author: Susie clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, much less stiff that the hose that came with my pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: RM

product_meta.title: PROPULSE, A Schieffer Co. 4000 PSI Grey 3/8" x 50 FT 1 Layers of High Tensile Wire Braided Rubber Wrapped Pressure Washer Hose with Couplers
product_meta.description:
Propulse Commercial Clean 4,000 PSI 3/8" x 50' Grey Rubber “Mark-Less” Hose with Quick-Connect Couplers. Rubber construction throughout, with a single layer of steel wire braid, the hose of choice for manufacturers of commercial duty pressure washers


ProPulse, a Schieffer Company, backed by more than 90 years of innovation


Features: 
• Assembled in USA with high quality components 
• Suitable for commercial pressure cleaning applications 
• Rubber construction throughout
• Reinforcement: One layer of high tensile braided steel – R1 Rating
• Cover Wrapped finish, “Mark-Less” with embossed lay line 
• Burst (Minimum): 3:1 working pressure 
• Impulse Life: 200,000+

Specifications: 
• Hose Inner Diameter: 3/8" ID
• Length: 50’
• Working (Maximum): Up to 4,000 PSI
• Burst (Minimum): 12,000 PSI
• Color: Grey
• Maximum Temperature: 250° F.
• Ends: 3/8" Quick Connect couplers ( 1 steel plug & 1 brass socket)
• Permanent heavy duty black bend restrictors on both ends
• Weight 9.60 lbs
feature_bullets: Assembled in USA with high quality components
Ends: 3/8" Quick Connect couplers ( 1 steel plug & 1 brass socket)
Suitable for commercial pressure cleaning applications - Rubber construction throughout
Reinforcement: One layer of high tensile braided steel – R1 Rating
Cover: Wrapped finish, “Mark-Less” with embossed lay line

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
